name: remolueoend.zsh-theme
description: Prezto ZSH theme based on Sorin, using emojis for tracking GIT context.
author: Remo Zumsteg <remolueoend@users.noreply.github.com>

scripts.postinstall: SITE_FN_DIR=/usr/local/share/zsh/site-functions npm run --silent postinstall-link && exit 0; SITE_FN_DIR="$PWD/functions" npm run postinstall-link
